kpi.name: M1008C260

kpi_info.title: FAILED HSPA INTRA-RNC IFHO DUE TO UE LOST
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Intra-RNC HSPA IFHOs due to UE being lost. UPDATED: When the UE does not respond with RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION COMPLETE and the user plane is released.

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED HSPA INTRA-RNC IFHO DUE TO UE LOST
